Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw two people positioned at a distance where communication would be necessary, indicating the need for a device like a string telephone.
The student can clearly depict a string telephone device connecting the two people, typically illustrated as two cups connected by a tight string.
The student can show arrows or small waves to indicate that the device uses sound to send information between the two people.
The student can illustrate that the string is taut, demonstrating an understanding of how the device works to help the two people talk from far away.
The student can label or indicate materials like cups and string, showing they understand the construction of the device based on common materials.
CANNOT: The student might overlook labeling one of the materials correctly, such as not explicitly labeling the cups *(minor oversight)*.
The student could mistakenly draw one of the cups open side down, slightly misrepresenting how the string telephone should be used *(minor misunderstanding)*.
